short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Realize how often you go on Facebook per day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Counter is the best way to detox from Facebook.

Each time you go on Facebook, Counter shows up, and counts a visit.
Your goal is to keep Counter low. 

Ready to start thinking before launching Facebook?
